title: Stealing Mercy
description: A girl disguised as a boy.A villain with a brothel to fill.A hero wondering why heâ€™s in love with a lad in breeches.Serving murder, mayhem and pies, Stealing Mercy is a romantic adventure set in 1889 on the eve of the Great Seattle Fire when more than the city is set on fire.
